scripts.install:projects: npm install --prefix website && npm install --prefix crm && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.start:ngrok:none: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up ngrok start  --none
scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml rm -f && rm -rf website/.next crm/dist backend/dist && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.clean:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml rm -f && rm -rf website/.next crm/dist backend/dist && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -rf package-lock.json
